briefTitle: Comparison of PEAK PlasmaBlade™ to Conventional Diathermy in Abdominal Based Free Flap Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: Comparison of PEAK PlasmaBlade™ to Conventional Diathermy in Abdominal Based Free Flap Breast Reconstruction - a Single Centre, Double Blinded Randomised Controlled Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of days the abdominal drains were required
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adults between 18-80 years, able to consent
* Unilateral immediate or delayed DIEP/ MS-TRAM breast reconstruction
* BMI \>20

Exclusion Criteria:

* Children (\<18 years) and adults older than 80 years
* Bilateral or bi-pedicled DIEP/MS-TRAM breast reconstruction
* BMI \<20
* Diabetic
* Immune-suppression
* Clotting disorders
* On steroid medication
* Pregnancy
* Active smoking
